projects.name: shop-saver
projects.description: Full-stack app with separate backend, frontend, and service modules. Built with Python, TypeScript, and Rust and orchestrated with Docker (docker-compose, init.sql).

projects.name: music-genre-classification
projects.description: Python-based experiments for music genre classification with simple client/server scripts and a small QML UI prototype.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio built with React Router, Vite, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS; deployed to GitHub Pages.
